com.jidesoft.grid
Interface TableModelWrapper

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultTableModelWrapper
public interface TableModelWrapper

TableModelWrapper is a wrapper around table model which is referred as the actual table model or underlying table model. It can be used to provide a different view to the actual model. A typical use case is SortableTableModel.

Method Summary
 javax.swing.table.TableModel getActualModel()
          Gets the underlying table model.
 int getActualRowAt(int row)
          Gets the actual row index in the underlying table that corresponds the specified row index.
 int getRowAt(int actualRow)
          Gets the visual row index representing the specified actual row.
